IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package algorithms :: Module posture_reconstruction :: Class PostureReconstructor

Class PostureReconstructor

source code

Base class for posture reconstruction algorithms.

A posture estimator takes data from IMUs on a jointed rigid body and updates the joint rotations of a SampledBodyModel.

Method Details

__init__(self, bodyModel, initialJointRotations=[])
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise posture reconstructor.

Parameters:
  • bodyModel - The SampledBodyModel to update.
  • initialJointRotations - List of initial joint rotations in depth first pre-order, as Quaternion objects.
Overrides: object.__init__

__call__(self, data, t)
(Call operator)

source code 

Update the posture of the model given the current model state and additional data.

Parameters:
  • data - Data friom sensors attached to the body model, as a list of dict objects. E.g. these may be RadioPacket objects with data transmitted by each IMU.
  • t - The time at which this data was valid.
